misc: Regularly competes in the Finnish Mid Tour as well with decent results
biography: Sami, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, is known for his composed demeanor and strategic approach to the game. Representing Hirsala Golf, Sami consistently brings a level of quiet intensity to the competition. While the coveted Hector Trophée and the Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, his dedication remains unwavering as he is gearing up to participate in his seventh Hector Trophée in 2025.

Beyond the Hector Trophée, Sami regularly competes in the Finnish Mid Tour, where he has achieved respectable results. His peers often remark on his meticulous preparation and his ability to remain focused under pressure. Although victory has remained out of reach, Sami's consistent presence and commitment to improvement make him one to watch as he continues to refine his game.
